sentences.english: Working at Dampier Co. , which develops applied software.
sentences.chinese: 我在丹皮爾公司，它主要是開發應用軟件。

sentences.english: Hawthorn and hawthorn sweetend roll film is the most common and most popular varieties.
sentences.chinese: 山楂片和山楂果丹皮是最普通，最流行的品種。

sentences.english: The effects of aqueous decoction of peony radices cortex(ADPRC) on C.
sentences.chinese: 研究牡丹皮水煎劑對體外白念珠菌生物膜的影響。

sentences.english: I'm working at dampier co. which develops applied software.
sentences.chinese: 我在丹皮爾公司，它主要是開發應用軟件。

sentences.english: There is a pronounced correlation between biochemical composition of peony and their corresponding effective content in soils.
sentences.chinese: 丹皮中生化成分與土壤中相應元素具有顯著相關性。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the identification methods for Cortex Moutan and Radix Stephaniae Tetrandrae in Lixin Pill.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究利心丸中的牡丹皮和防己的鑑別方法。

sentences.english: The content determination method for Paeonol Ointment has been revised.
sentences.chinese: 對丹皮酚軟膏的含量測定方法進行了修訂。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the quality of Cortex Moudan which grew for four years from main planting parts in Anhui province.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析安徽主要牡丹皮產地四年生的牡丹皮質量。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the quality of Cortex Moudan which grew for four years from main planting parts in Anhui province.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析安徽主要牡丹皮產地四年生的牡丹皮質量。

sentences.english: Joy's father is Stumpy , and Stumpy is the brother of Zebra.
sentences.chinese: 喬伊的父親叫史丹皮，而史丹皮是斑仔的兄弟。

sentences.english: Joy's father is Stumpy , and Stumpy is the brother of Zebra.

sentences.english: Conclusion It is valuable to study paeonol and its derivatives.
sentences.chinese: 結論研究丹皮酚及其衍生物具有非常重要的意義。

sentences.english: Objective To study on the multible-extracting technology of Cortex moutan .
sentences.chinese: 目的研究丹皮綜合提取的工藝。

sentences.english: The anti-inflammatory and anti-allergic effects of Cortex Moutan Radicis were reported.
sentences.chinese: 本文報告了丹皮的抗炎作用和抗變態反應作用。

sentences.english: Conclusion The method can be used scientifically as a quality control for Moutan cortex.
sentences.chinese: 結論爲牡丹皮藥材的質量控制提供了科學的依據。

sentences.english: As William Dampier said, "The Middle Age is the cradle of the modern times."
sentences.chinese: 如丹皮爾所說“中世紀是近代的搖籃”。
